lead_paragraph: MONDAY'S PUZZLE - Sometimes a tiny twist is all that's needed to elevate a mundane crossword theme into something memorable. Three answers based on the straightforward phrases THE SPEED OF LIGHT, THE SOUND OF MUSIC and THE COLOR OF MONEY would be bland. Simply by spinning the dial on the last words so they don't match up properly, a new constructor, Diane Baker van Hoff, ups the ante with unexpected interconnectedness.
snippet: A debut puzzle from Diane Baker van Hoff features a "Sesame Street" character with a unibrow.
abstract: A debut puzzle from Diane Baker van Hoff features a "Sesame Street" character with a unibrow.
